Interface R2ShaderLightScreenSingleType<M extends R2LightSingleReadableType>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of shader parameters

    public interface R2ShaderLightScreenSingleType<M extends R2LightSingleReadableType>
extends R2ShaderLightSingleType<M>, R2ShaderScreenType<M>, R2ShaderLightScreenSingleUsableType<M>
